title: Dona Flor Bar Cafe
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Mediterranean, Juice bar, Take-out, Bakery, Portugese, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Has vegan options like seitan and mushroom pie, tofu and leek pie, falafel, vegan cheese, vegan chocolate cake, vegan apple and nut cake, and vegan mango ice cream. Also has coffee, juice, and sweets.
